trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>-derived objects that are used by data source controls in advanced data-binding scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 代表集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>和<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"> </xref>-衍生物件所使用的進階資料繫結案例中的資料來源控制項。

trans-unit.source: The ParameterCollection class represents a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> objects used in advanced data-binding scenarios with data source controls.
trans-unit.target: ParameterCollection 類別表示的集合<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>用於與資料來源控制項的進階資料繫結案例中的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> objects are used to bind the values contained by local <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> variables, HTTP cookies, session variables, and other controls' values to data source controls when retrieving, updating, deleting, and inserting data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>物件用來將本機所包含的值繫結<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>變數、 HTTP cookie、 工作階段變數和其他控制項的值，以擷取、 更新、 刪除和插入資料時，資料來源控制項。</xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: Use the ParameterCollection class to programmatically manage a set of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> objects.
trans-unit.target: 以程式設計方式管理一組使用 ParameterCollection 類別<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: You can add, insert, and remove <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> objects using the appropriate methods of the ParameterCollection class.
trans-unit.target: 您可以加入、 插入和移除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>物件使用適當方法的 ParameterCollection 類別。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: To programmatically retrieve <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> objects from a collection, use one of following methods: - Use the indexer to get a single <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object from the collection, by name or using array notation.
trans-unit.target: 若要以程式設計方式擷取<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>物件從一個集合，使用下列方法之一:-使用索引子以取得單一<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>物件從集合中，依名稱或使用陣列標記法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create a <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-implemented object, which can then be used to get items from the collection.
trans-unit.target: -使用<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>方法來建立<xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName>-實作的物件，然後可以用來從集合取得項目。</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Count%2A> property specifies the total number of items in the collection, and is used to determine the upper bound of the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Count%2A>屬性集合中指定的項目總數，以及用來判斷集合中的上限。</xref:System.Web.UI.StateManagedCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can add and remove items from the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.Add%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.Insert%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.Remove%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.RemoveAt%2A> methods.
trans-unit.target: 您可以新增和移除集合中的項目，使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.Add%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.Insert%2A>， <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.Remove%2A>，和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.RemoveAt%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: Depending on the implementation and the semantics of a particular data source control, the order in which the parameters are stored in the ParameterCollection collection might be important.
trans-unit.target: 根據特定資料來源控制項的語意與實作，這些參數儲存 ParameterCollection 集合中的順序可能十分重要。

trans-unit.source: For example, when using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control as an ODBC data source, the order of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> objects in the ParameterCollection collection must be the same as the order of the parameters in the parameterized SQL queries you use.
trans-unit.target: 例如，當使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控制項做為 ODBC 資料來源的順序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>ParameterCollection 集合中的物件必須是您使用參數化 SQL 查詢中參數的順序相同。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: However, when using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control with Microsoft SQL Server, the order of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> objects are not important.
trans-unit.target: 不過，當使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>控制項與 Microsoft SQL Server 的順序<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>物件並不重要。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: > [!IMPORTANT] > When you use data source controls, values are inserted into command parameters without validation, which is a potential security threat.
trans-unit.target: > [!IMPORTANT] > 當您使用資料來源控制項時，將值插入命令參數，不需要驗證，可能會造成安全性威脅。

trans-unit.source: Use an event in the data source control to validate parameter values before the command is executed.
trans-unit.target: 使用資料來源控制項中的事件，來執行命令之前，請驗證參數值。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[指令碼擅用概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the different parameter classes and how they are used.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出不同的參數類別和使用方式。

trans-unit.source: |Parameter Class|Description| |---------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>|The base parameter class.
trans-unit.target: |參數類別 |描述 | |---------------------|-----------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>|基底參數類別</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: Use it to bind to a local variable or any static string using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A> property.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>|A parameter that can be used to bind to a control's property or method return value.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter>|A parameter that can be used to bind to the value of a cookie.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter>|A parameter that can be used to bind to an attribute of the current Web Forms page.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter>|A parameter that can be used to bind to a value passed to a Web Forms page on a query string.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter>|A parameter that can be used to bind to the value of a session variable.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ProfileParameter>|A parameter that can be used to bind to the value of an ASP.NET Profile property.|
trans-unit.target: 使用繫結至區域變數或任何使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A>屬性的靜態字串。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>|可用來將繫結至控制項的屬性或方法的參數傳回值。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter>|可用來將繫結至的 cookie 值的參數。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter>|可以使用之屬性目前的 Web Form 網頁的繫結的參數。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter>|可用來繫結至值的參數傳遞至 Web Form 網頁上的查詢字串。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter>|可用來將繫結至工作階段變數的值的參數。 | |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ProfileParameter>|可用來將繫結至 ASP.NET 設定檔屬性的值的參數。 |</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ProfileParameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.DefaultValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes the class for use by an inherited class instance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化類別的繼承的類別執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This constructor can be called only by an inherited class.
trans-unit.target: 可以呼叫這個建構函式只能由繼承的類別。

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> object to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 將指定的附加<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>物件集合的結尾。

trans-unit.source: Use the Add method to append a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Add 方法附加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>物件集合的結尾。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the method takes the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object specified by the `param` parameter and appends it to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的實作會採用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>所指定物件`param`參數，並將它附加至集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> to append to the collection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"> </xref>来附加至集合。

trans-unit.source: The index value of the added item.
trans-unit.target: 加入項目的索引值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> object with the specified name and default value, and appends it to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>物件具有指定的名稱和預設值，並將它附加至集合結尾。

trans-unit.source: Use the Add method to create and append a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object with a default value to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用 Add 方法來建立並附加<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>物件，其預設值至集合結尾。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the method creates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object using the name and default value specified by the `name` and `value` parameters, respectively, and appends it to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的實作會建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>物件使用所指定的名稱和預設值`name`和`value`參數分別，並將它附加至集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 參數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: A string that serves as a default value for the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 字串，做為參數的預設值。

trans-unit.source: The index value of the added item.
trans-unit.target: 加入項目的索引值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> object with the specified name, database type, and default value, and adds it to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>物件具有指定的名稱、 資料庫類型和預設值，並將它加入至集合結尾。

trans-unit.source: This method is for database types.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法是讓資料庫類型。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.Add%28System.String%2CSystem.TypeCode%2CSystem.String%29> method for CLR types.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.Add%28System.String%2CSystem.TypeCode%2CSystem.String%29>CLR 型別的方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.Add%28System.String%2CSystem.TypeCode%2CSystem.String%29>

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 參數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The database type of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 資料庫參數的類型。

trans-unit.source: The default value for the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 參數的預設值。

trans-unit.source: The index value of the added item.
trans-unit.target: 加入項目的索引值。

trans-unit.source: Creates a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> object with the specified name, <xref:System.TypeCode>, and default value, and appends it to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 建立<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>物件具有指定名稱， <xref:System.TypeCode>，預設值，並將它附加至集合結尾。</xref:System.TypeCode>

trans-unit.source: Use the Add method to create and append a strongly typed <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object with a default value to the end of the collection.
trans-unit.target: 若要建立並附加強型別使用的 Add 方法<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>物件，其預設值至集合結尾。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: This implementation of the method creates the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object using the name, type and value specified by the `name`, `type` and `value` parameters, respectively, and appends it to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法的實作會建立<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>物件使用的名稱、 類型和值所指定`name`，`type`和`value`參數分別，並將它附加至集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 參數的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The type of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 參數的型別。

trans-unit.source: The default value for the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 參數的預設值。

trans-unit.source: The index value of the added item.
trans-unit.target: 加入項目的索引值。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"></xref> collection contains a specific value
trans-unit.target: 決定是否<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"></xref>集合包含特定值

trans-unit.source: Use this method to determine whether a specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object is in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用此方法來判斷是否指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>物件是處於<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> to locate in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"> </xref>中尋找<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the object is found in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果物件位於<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"> </xref>，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If is passed for the value parameter, is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果傳遞給 value 參數， 傳回。

trans-unit.source: Copies a specified index of a parameter array to the parameter collection.
trans-unit.target: 將指定之索引的參數陣列複製到參數集合。

trans-unit.source: Parameter array from which the value at a specified index is to be copied from.
trans-unit.target: 參數陣列的指定索引處的值是從複製。

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""></xref> index of the `parameterArray` item that is to be copied.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_integer" name="integer" href=""> </xref>索引`parameterArray`是要複製的項目。

trans-unit.source: Creates an instance of a default <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 建立預設的執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The CreateKnownType method creates an instance of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object according to the index of the <xref:System.Type> returned by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: CreateKnownType 方法建立的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>物件的索引根據<xref:System.Type>傳回<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.GetKnownTypes%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: The index values correspond to types shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 索引值對應於下表所示的類型。

trans-unit.source: |Index|Parameter type| |-----------|--------------------| |0|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>| |1|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter>| |2|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter>| |3|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>| |4|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter>| |5|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter>| |6|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ProfileParameter>|
trans-unit.target: |索引 |參數類型 | |-----------|--------------------| |&0; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>| |&1; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter>| |&2; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter>| |&3; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>| |&4; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter>| |&5; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter>| |&6; |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ProfileParameter>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ProfileParameter></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SessionParameter></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.QueryStringParameter></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.CookieParameter></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter>

trans-unit.source: The index of the type of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> to create from the ordered list of types returned by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.GetKnownTypes*>.
trans-unit.target: 型別的索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>建立從已排序清單<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.GetKnownTypes*>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection.GetKnownTypes*>所傳回的類型

trans-unit.source: A default instance of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The specified index is not within the recognized range.
trans-unit.target: 指定的索引不是可辨識的範圍內。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> types that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"></xref> collection can contain.
trans-unit.target: 取得陣列的<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>類型<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"></xref>集合可以包含。

trans-unit.source: An ordered array of <xref:System.Type> objects that identify the types of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> objects that the collection can contain.
trans-unit.target: 已排序的陣列<xref:System.Type>識別之類型的物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>集合可包含的物件。</xref:System.Type>

trans-unit.source: Gets an ordered collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> object names and their corresponding values currently contained by the collection.
trans-unit.target: 取得已排序的集合<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>物件名稱和其目前集合中所包含的對應值。

trans-unit.source: The `control` parameter is used by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> objects contained in the collection to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> and current <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> object that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object binds to.
trans-unit.target: `control`參數由用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>擷取集合中包含的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>和目前<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>物件將繫結至。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> </xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> object must have uniquely named entries but the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> collection does not require or guarantee unique <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object names, the implementation of this method appends a number to the end of each <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A> property to ensure uniqueness in the returned collection.
trans-unit.target: 因為<xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>物件必須具有唯一名稱的項目但<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>集合不需要或保證唯一<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>物件名稱，這個方法的實作會將數字附加至每個尾端<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A>屬性，以確保傳回之集合中的唯一性。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.Name%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> </xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"></xref> that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> binds to.
trans-unit.target: 目前<xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"> </xref> ， <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"> </xref>繫結。

trans-unit.source: The index of parameter, if it is found in the collection; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: 索引 parameter ，則為集合中找到則為-1。

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> object into the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"></xref> collection at the specified index.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> to insert.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"> </xref>插入。

trans-unit.source: index is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: index小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or- index is greater than .
trans-unit.target: -index大於 。

trans-unit.source: Performs additional custom processes when validating a value.
trans-unit.target: 驗證值時，請執行額外的自訂程序。

trans-unit.source: The OnValidate method determines whether the object specified in the `o` parameter is a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> instance.
trans-unit.target: OnValidate 方法可讓您判斷是否在指定的物件`o`參數是<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>執行個體。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: If not, it throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果沒有，就會擲回<xref:System.ArgumentException>例外狀況。</xref:System.ArgumentException>

trans-unit.source: The <xref uid="langword_csharp_object" name="object" href=""></xref> being validated.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_object" name="object" href=""> </xref>未經驗證。

trans-unit.source: The object is not an instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> class or one of its derived classes.
trans-unit.target: 物件不是執行個體<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>類別或其衍生類別的其中一個。

trans-unit.source: The object is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 物件是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when one or more <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> objects contained by the collection changes state.
trans-unit.target: 發生於一個或多個<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>包含集合變更狀態的物件。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> collection is contained by a data source control, the ParametersChanged event raises the data source control's `DataSourceChanged` event, causing any data-bound controls to rebind.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>集合包含的資料來源控制項，ParametersChanged 事件引發資料來源控制項的`DataSourceChanged`事件，造成任何資料繫結的控制項重新繫結。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引發事件會透過委派事件處理常式叫用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [NIB: Raising an Event](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 引發事件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/f2adaf01-1ed1-42e1-8c31-8d467e7e0ee2)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.OnParameterChanged%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.OnParameterChanged%2A>方法也允許衍生的類別處理事件，而不用附加委派。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.OnParameterChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 這是處理衍生類別中的事件的慣用的技巧。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 移除指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>物件從<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"></xref>集合。

trans-unit.source: Use this method to remove the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用這個方法來移除指定<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>物件從<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection>集合。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> to remove from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"> </xref>移除<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> object at the specified index from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"></xref> collection.
trans-unit.target: 移除<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>從指定索引處的物件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ParameterCollection"></xref>集合。

trans-unit.source: Use the RemoveAt method to remove the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object at the specified index from the collection.
trans-unit.target: 使用 RemoveAt 方法移除<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>從集合指定索引處的物件。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: The index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> to remove.
trans-unit.target: 索引<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>移除。

trans-unit.source: Marks the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> object as having changed since the last load or save from view state.
trans-unit.target: 標示指定<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>為自上次載入後已變更的物件，或從檢視狀態儲存。

trans-unit.source: The SetDirtyObject method is a helper function that is used to mark a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object as having changed since the last load or save from view state.
trans-unit.target: SetDirtyObject 方法是用來標記協助程式函式<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>為自上次載入後已變更的物件，或從檢視狀態儲存。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This method is used only by control developers.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 這個方法只由控制項開發人員。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> to mark as having changed since the last load or save from view state.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"> </xref>標示為自上次載入後已變更，或從檢視狀態儲存。

trans-unit.source: Iterates through the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> objects contained by the collection, and calls the <xref uid="langword_csharp_Evaluate" name="Evaluate" href=""></xref> method on each one.
trans-unit.target: 逐一查看<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref>物件集合，而且會呼叫包含<xref uid="langword_csharp_Evaluate" name="Evaluate" href=""></xref>上每個方法。

trans-unit.source: The `control` parameter is used by <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> objects contained in the collection to retrieve the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> and current <xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> object that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object binds to.
trans-unit.target: `control`參數由用<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>擷取集合中包含的物件<xref:System.Web.UI.Page>和目前<xref:System.Web.HttpRequest>物件<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>物件將繫結至。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> </xref:System.Web.HttpRequest> </xref:System.Web.UI.Page> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: If the current value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter> object is different from the value cached in view state, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.OnParameterChanged%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: 如果目前值<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>物件是在檢視狀態中快取的值不同<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.OnParameterChanged%2A>方法呼叫。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter.OnParameterChanged%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter>

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"></xref> that the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> binds to.
trans-unit.target: 目前<xref href="System.Web.HttpRequest"> </xref> ， <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"> </xref>繫結。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"></xref> instance that is passed to each parameter's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate*> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control"> </xref>傳遞至每個參數的執行個體<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate*>方法。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ControlParameter.Evaluate*>
